name: Gas for Climate
bossPosition: Navigant Project Manager for Gas for Climate study
goal: We are ‘Gas for Climate: a path to 2050’ a group of seven leading European gas transport companies (Enagás, Fluxys, Gasunie, GRTgaz, Open Grid Europe, Snam and Teréga) and two renewable gas industry associations (European Biogas Association and Consorzio Italiano Biogas). We are committed to achieve net zero greenhouse gas emissions in the EU by 2050 and are united in our conviction that renewable and low carbon gas used through existing gas infrastructure will help to deliver this at the lowest possible costs and maximum benefits for the European economy. Gas for Climate aims to assess and create awareness about the role of renewable and low carbon gas in the future energy system. Our group includes leading gas infrastructure companies in six EU Member States that are collectively responsible for 75% of total natural gas consumption in Europe.
euInitiatives: Gas for Climate aims to assess and create awareness about the role of renewable and low carbon gas in the future energy system.
